coreAtributes.clothingAuthorTag: A tag discreetly sewn into the dress's inner lining informs you that it was made by 'Phlarx'.
coreAtributes.name: evening gown
coreAtributes.description: An elegant evening gown, perfect for dinner parties with the social elite.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unzip)] the back of [npc.her] evening gown, letting it fall to [npc.her] feet.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unzip)] the back of [npc2.namePos] evening gown, letting it fall to [npc2.her] feet.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unzip)] the back of [npc2.namePos] evening gown, and [npc.verb(yank)] it down to [npc2.her] feet.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] the evening gown up to [npc.her] chest, then [npc.verb(zip)] it closed.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] the evening gown up to [npc2.namePos] chest, then [npc.verb(zip)] it closed.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(pull)] the evening gown up to [npc2.namePos] chest, then [npc.verb(tug)] the zipper closed.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] up the skirt of [npc.her] evening gown.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] up the skirt of [npc2.namePos] evening gown.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(pull)] up the skirt of [npc2.namePos] evening gown.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] down the skirt of [npc.her] evening gown.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] down the skirt of [npc2.namePos] evening gown.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(pull)] down the skirt of [npc2.namePos] evening gown.
